attributes.action: Instruct all MPs to consult their constituencies before voting on Article 50
attributes.background: We the undersigned ask that all MPs consult their constituents on their feelings on leaving the EU before voting to trigger Article 50. Since the initial referendum vote people's opinions have changed, and many people who voted to leave now regret it. We need an accurate and current view on the EU.

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of individual MPs, not of the Government or Parliament as a whole.
